list_definition.definition: any substance used for colouring/coloring, making paint etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: People used to make paint and dyes from natural pigments.

list_definition.definition: a substance in plants or animals that gives colour/color to the skin, leaves etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Some people have darker pigment in their skin than others.
